content: After resting at the Shrine at the foot the temple, head up its foreboding steps into the temple’s front gate. The path is strewn with the meat of many a Rat Guai sacrifice — a sacrifice to whom you’ll soon find out.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Crouching_Tiger_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Crouching Tiger Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection 'Temple Entrance'.
The content is as follows:
After resting at the Shrine at the foot the temple, head up its foreboding steps into the temple’s front gate. The path is strewn with the meat of many a Rat Guai sacrifice — a sacrifice to whom you’ll soon find out.
